content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am pleased to negotiate the rental price with you. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in the apartment, but the price is very important to me. I would like to pay as low as possible. Can you offer me a discount?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am sorry, but I cannot offer a discount. I am looking to rent out my apartment for the highest possible price. Please make an offer that reflects its value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want to get the best price for your apartment, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I am on a budget. I am willing to pay 800 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 800 Euro is too low for the apartment's value. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot afford to pay more than 800 Euro per month. If you are not willing to accept this price, I will have to look for other options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but I cannot accept 800 Euro per month. If you are not willing to pay more, we will have to terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
